SEARCH
Package Controller.EntityControllers

Class Product

java.lang.Object
Controller.EntityControllers.Product
public class Product extends Object
The Product class represents a product entity with various attributes. It provides methods to interact with the ProductDAO to load and manipulate product data.

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product()
      Default constructor for the Product class.

    • Product

      public Product(Integer id, String name, Double price, Integer categoryID, Integer supplierID, Integer quantity, Integer limit, String status)
      Parameterized constructor for the Product class.
      Parameters:
      id - The product ID.
      name - The product name.
      price - The product price.
      categoryID - The ID of the category to which the product belongs.
      supplierID - The ID of the supplier providing the product.
      quantity - The available quantity of the product.
      limit - The quantity limit for the product.
      status - The status of the product (e.g., active, discontinued).

  • Method Details

    • getProducts

      public ArrayList<Product> getProducts()
      Retrieves a list of all products from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Product objects representing all products.

    • loadMultiple

      public ArrayList<Product> loadMultiple(Integer i)
      Loads multiple products from the database based on a specified parameter.
      Parameters:
      i - The parameter used for loading multiple products.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Product objects representing the loaded products.

    • loadSearched

      public ArrayList<Product> loadSearched(String keyword)
      Loads products from the database based on a search keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The search keyword.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Product objects representing the searched products.

    • insert

      public boolean insert()
      Inserts a new Product into the database.
      Returns:
      true if the insertion is successful, false otherwise.

    • getMaxId

      public Integer getMaxId()
      Retrieves the maximum product ID using the associated DAO's getMaxId method.
      Returns:
      The maximum product ID as an Integer, or 0 if there is an issue or no records.

    • updateQty

      public void updateQty(Integer PID, Integer quantity)
      Updates the quantity of a product in the database.
      Parameters:
      PID - The product ID.
      quantity - The new quantity value.

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(Integer PID)
      Updates the status of a product in the database.
      Parameters:
      PID - The product ID.

    • update

      public boolean update()
      Updates the information of the current product in the database.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • loadSingle

      public Product loadSingle(Integer i)
      Loads a single product from the database based on the product ID.
      Parameters:
      i - The product ID.
      Returns:
      A Product object representing the loaded product.
